description.short: Put the power of your truck to work and look good doing it with the performance wheel and tire combination that is perfectly suited for the job.
description.long: All the power and performance of your truck won't do any good unless you can get traction to the ground. THOR can help you put the power of your truck to work and look good doing it with the performance wheel and tire combination that is perfectly suited for your adventure.

content.sidebar:
If you're looking to build your vehicle for ride quality AND towing capabilty, that's no problem at THOR Off-Road.

We pride ourselves on creating "Purpose Built" vehicles. When towing is a consideration we want to ensure your vehicle is up to the task. Towing isn't something we take lightly and you shouldn't either.

From the right hitch, configuration, tire requirements, air assist and lights, we've got you covered. We use high quality hitches from B&W Hitches, Curt Manufacturing and Reese. Whether you need a turnover ball to tow a gooseneck or a fifth wheel hithc to tow your trailer, we know what works best.

If you only need a simple bumper hitch, we sell and install quality options from B&W, Tow & Stow and BulletProof Hitches. We can also outfit your vehicle with air bags or air assist to make sure the load out back stays level and pulls like a dream.

No matter the load, RV trailer, toy hauler, car hauler or equipment, THOR Off-Road can get you setup.
